Class RpcMapperV18

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RpcMapperI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RpcMapperV17

    public class RpcMapperV18
extends RpcMapperV19
implements RpcMapperI
    Rpc version mapping help class to convert between Rpc current version 19 and version vX(18) Other version mapping classes should extends the version above
